channel.title: Jacobr tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from Jacobr.

item.description: I was soooo funny way back in 2020 https://t.co/U8XzRdGmr5
item.source:markdown: I was soooo funny way back in 2020 https://t.co/U8XzRdGmr5

item.description: @mreider WOW - so many DMs are coming at me about this. Ok, ok, people .. more info about the protocol and how you can get involved here: https://t.co/uI0wq75IeX
item.source:markdown: @mreider WOW - so many DMs are coming at me about this. Ok, ok, people .. more info about the protocol and how you can get involved here: https://t.co/uI0wq75IeX

item.description: @mreider Luftbaloons? No! TurDucken3 is my preference. It's more scalable than Lufbaloons, and more sensitive to the Nuftchak variability - often seen with tech-biased (rather than market-biased) product teams.
item.source:markdown: @mreider Luftbaloons? No! TurDucken3 is my preference. It's more scalable than Lufbaloons, and more sensitive to the Nuftchak variability - often seen with tech-biased (rather than market-biased) product teams.

item.description: @mreider @mreider has an opinion. Just an idea - not prohibition. When deleted user stories breed a second life, just sing reincarnation songs and be happy for them!? In a forever backlog, just attach the reincarnation to its grandparent - leaving them forever at priority 99 together ..
item.source:markdown: @mreider @mreider has an opinion. Just an idea - not prohibition. When deleted user stories breed a second life, just sing reincarnation songs and be happy for them!? In a forever backlog, just attach the reincarnation to its grandparent - leaving them forever at priority 99 together ..

item.description: @mreider Priority = 99. Gotta leave them in the backlog or they'll come back again and you'll go through the effort again.
item.source:markdown: @mreider Priority = 99. Gotta leave them in the backlog or they'll come back again and you'll go through the effort again.
